item.title: Portal Npc dialogue help me please!
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

Base is Delta

A portal.

Can anyone help explain this to me?

This is the code:

case 2467: //Training sendFrame164(2492); sendFrame126("Main Portal", 2493); sendFrame126("Slayer Tower", 2494); sendFrame126("Skiller Area", 2495); sendFrame126("Assault MiniGame", 2496); sendFrame126("Barrows MiniGame", 2497); break;

Ok, what I want to know is how do you connect these to a case that teleports? Ill explain a bit more.

case 9194: //Barrows Minigame tele(3564, 3279); RemoveAllWindows(); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break;

How does this work?

Reward for the first to help me. ;D

Read full topic
item.source: Portal Npc dialogue help me please!
